onix – Main Classes¶

onix.Passport

Passport stores all the relevant data of indivudual nuclides and offers methods to extract information on them.

onix.Passlist

Passlist manages the list of nuclides’ passports.

onix.Cell

Cells (or BUCells), represent burnup regions and contain a unique onix.Passlist object with a specific list of nuclides.

onix.System

The system oject contains and organizes the ensemble of BUCells.

onix.Sequence

The sequence object contains information about the burnup and time sequence that ONIX will follow during simulations.
